text-1: At HyperloopUPV, we open our doors to new members every year. If you're eager to develop the transportation of the future with us and work on a unique and innovative project, check out our open positions below.
text-2: We are looking for profiles from all disciplines, both focused on engineering (Electromagnetism, Mechanical Systems, Electronics, Programming...) and in operations (Social Media, Graphic Design, Sponsors, Financial Management...)
